roleset.name: to give up, abandon

example.name: transitive
example.text: Moreover , your hypothetical investor has forsaken the gains [0] [*T*-2]to be had [*-1] in [*] reducing risk by [*] diversifying his portfolio .

roleset.note: FORSAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'forsake' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from forsake.01-v predicate notes)
